name: Frank J. Gaffney Jr.
education: Edmund A. Walsh School of Foreign Service (B.A., 1975), Paul H. Nitze School of Advanced International Studies
occupation: President of Center for Security Policy
awards: Department of Defense Medal for Distinguished Public Service (1987), Zionist Organization of America's Brandeis Award (Zionism)
box_width: '''Frank J. Gaffney Jr.''' (born 5 April 1953) is an American counter-jihad conspiracy theorist |
